Loop.name: L271
Loop.comment: This X12 Transaction Set contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Professional Healthcare Claim Transaction Set (271) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment.
Loop.Loop:
segment=HL:3:20:Information Source Level:R:1 segment=AAA:::Request Validation:S:9
segment=NM1:1:2B,36,GP,P5,PR:Information Source Name:R:1 segment=REF:::Information Source Additional Identification:S:9 segment=PER:::Information Source Contact Information:S:3 segment=AAA:::Request Validation:S:9

segment=HL:3:21:Information Receiver Level:S:1
segment=NM1:1:1P,2B,36,80,FA,GP,P5,PR:Information Receiver Name:R:1 segment=REF:::Information Receiver Additional Identification:S:9 segment=AAA:::Information Receiver Request Validation:S:9

segment=HL:3:22:Subscriber Level:S:1 segment=TRN:::Subscriber Trace Number:S:3
segment=NM1:1:IL:Subscriber Name:R:1 segment=REF:::Subscriber Additional Identification:S:9 segment=N3:::Subscriber Address:S:1 segment=N4:::Subscriber City/State/ZIP Code:S:1 segment=PER:::Subscriber Contact Information:S:3 segment=AAA:::Subscriber Request Validation:S:9 segment=DMG:::Subscriber Demographic Information:S:1 segment=INS:::Subscriber Relationship:S:1 segment=DTP:::Subscriber Date:S:9
segment=EB:::Subscriber Eligibility or Benefit Information:S:1 segment=HSD:::Health Care Services Delivery:S:9 segment=REF:::Subscriber Additional Identification:S:9 segment=DTP:::Subscriber Eligibility/Benefit Date:S:20 segment=AAA:::Subscriber Request Validation:S:9 segment=MSG:::Message Text:S:10
segment=III:::Subscriber Eligibility or Benefit Additional Information:S:1 segment=LS:::Loop Header:S:1
segment=NM1:1:1P,2B,36,73,FA,GP,IL,LR,P3,P4,P5,PR,PRP,SEP,TTP,VN,X3:Subscriber Benefit Related Entity Name:S:1 segment=N3:::Subscriber Benefit Related Entity Address:S:1 segment=N4:::Subscriber Benefit Related City/State/ZIP Code:S:1 segment=PER:::Subscriber Benefit Related Entity Contact Information:S:3 segment=PRV:::Subscriber Benefit Related Provider Information:S:1 segment=LE:::Loop Trailer:S:1

segment=HL:3:23:Dependent Level:S:1 segment=TRN:::Dependent Trace Number:S:3
segment=NM1:1:03:Dependent Name:R:1 segment=REF:::Dependent Additional Identification:S:9 segment=N3:::Dependent Address:S:1 segment=N4:::Dependent City/State/ZIP Code:S:1 segment=PER:::Dependent Contact Information:S:3 segment=AAA:::Dependent Request Validation:S:9 segment=DMG:::Dependent Demographic Information:S:1 segment=INS:::Dependent Relationship:S:1 segment=DTP:::Dependent Date:S:9
segment=EB:::Dependent Eligibility or Benefit Information:S:1 segment=HSD:::Health Care Services Delivery:S:9 segment=REF:::Dependent Additional Identification:S:9 segment=DTP:::Dependent Eligibility/Benefit Date:S:20 segment=AAA:::Dependent Request Validation:S:9 segment=MSG:::Message Text:S:10
segment=III:::Dependent Eligibility or Benefit Additional Information:S:1 segment=LS:::Dependent Eligibility or Benefit Information:S:1
segment=NM1:1:1P,2B,36,73,FA,GP,IL,LR,P3,P4,P5,PR,PRP,SEP,TTP,VN,X3:Dependent Benefit Related Entity Name:S:1 segment=N3:::Dependent Benefit Related Entity Address:S:1 segment=N4:::Dependent Benefit Related Entity City/State/ZIP Code:S:1 segment=PER:::Dependent Benefit Related Entity Contact Information:S:3 segment=PRV:::Dependent Benefit Related Provider Information:S:1 segment=LE:::Loop Trailer:S:1
